pageProduct.name: Restoria Express for Men Dark Brown
pageProduct.description:
Information

General Information

Restoria Express Men lets you simply brush away the grey in just 5 minutes for natural looking colour.

Simply brush away the grey in just 5 minutes.
Express Men is the quick and easy way to maintain your original hair colour or target specific areas of grey, making you feel and look yourself again.
Express Men includes a unique precision engineered brush-in applicator that makes application easy and speedy, and a no-drip cream formula that prevents running or splatter. With resealable tubes, Express Men can be used multiple times. Express Men is optimal for first greys as it can be applied only on the first greys. Its unique formula developed in the USA will not damage your hair and will certainly blend away grey for a natural look

Boxed Contents: Colour Cream, Colour Developer, Gloves, Brush Applicator , Leaflet

Size: 90g

KEY FEATURES

• Brushes away the grey in 5 minutes.
• Precision engineered brush-in applicator makes application easy.
• Can target specific areas of grey such as side-burns and facial hair.
• Resealabe tubes allowing for multiple applications.
• Ideal for first greys.

Warnings

Keep Out Of Reach Of Children and Warning: This Product contains ingredients which may cause skin irritation to certain individuals. A preliminary test according to the accompany directions should be made before use. This product must not be used for dyeing eyelashes or eyebrows; to do so may be injurious to the eye

Ingredients

Dark Brown:
Water/Aqua, Cetearyl Alcohol, Propylene Glycol, Ethanolamine, p-Phenylenediamine, Resorcinol, N,N-Bis (2-Hydroxyethyl)-p-Phenylenediamine Sulfate, m-Aminophenol, Fragrance/Parfum, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Carbomer, Ascorbic Acid, Sodium Sulfite, Disodium EDTA, p-Aminophenol, 2,4-Diaminophenoxyethanol Sulfate

Developer - Water/Aqua, Cetearyl Alcohol, Hydrogen Peroxide, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Phosphoric Acid, Sodium Stannate, Disodium EDTA

Directions

Refer to the easy step-by-step directions leaflet inside pack
